about_the_game:
VR RTS

A classic RTS in VR. Featuring a completely new way of interacting with a RTS game. While keeping the basics like base building, resource gathering and crushing your enemy with overwhelming firepower. As the commander you stand in a futuristic war room. You can move around on the vast battlefield, or scale it down for a better overview.

The DEMO

The demo includes a tutorial to get you started. The VR RTS genre is low on games, so the interaction and movement systems might not be familiar to all players. With the help of the tutorial you will quickly know all the basics. 

After the tutorial there are 4 missions of increasing features and difficulty. In the full game there will be more missions in between, to increase the difficulty more gradually. The demo has this difficulty curve to show there is a challenge for every skill level. 

The demo will receive updates when improvements are made to the game that influence the missions of the demo. This could be due to changes in game design or player feedback. 

The full game

Please wishlist the full game to show your intrest in VR RTS. More information about the full game can be found on the Unoffensible steam page. It will have a more gradual learning curve than the demo, so more players can finish the game.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3700x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 5700XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support: OpenXR

short_description: A classic RTS in VR, where you command a high-tech force against a battle-hardened enemy. The war room of the future awaits you! This demo includes the tutorial and 4 missions. Expected play time of the demo would be ~1 hour.
